title: The Beekeeper

fields.name: Harvest Honey (Passive):
fields.value: As long as you are alive, you will grant a score boost equal to one tenth of your score to all Mafia-aligned players.

fields.name: Place Hive:
fields.value: Place a bee hive outside your target's residence. The next time you outplace them, you will astrally roleblock all of their visitors.

fields.name: Wasp Nest! (0x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlock and gain one ammo each time you place in the top 6. Place a wasp nest at your target's residence. The next time you outplace them, you will astrally rampage attack them with 1.1x attack power.

desc:
Post 177
*Did you know bee stings have a number of surprising health benefits?*
